Posts.Content: Hi,had the arm checked and gotta ring for advice if still got pain on Monday, had picc line took out Friday so they didn't know if that was causing anything, but its still bad and swollen a little so will be ringing, and yes got the running nose and joint pain. With herceptin so in for a fun few days, have tried. Heat compress as advised and pain relief but doesn't seem to help really.
Posts.Title: journey update

Posts.Content: so, chemo finished and mastectomy and node clearance gone through, although early days,, not feeling too bad but sore and tender from the op, had the herseptin injection today  and get side effects from that so not looking forward to next few days,  radiation to follow,  got to watch arm where picc line was taken out has i got phlebitis in it and is very painfull still, so my journey is on the up side now xx

Posts.Content: Hi, I'm on herceptin number 8, feeling tired all the time despite sleeping,  and got aches n pains in legs and arms, to top it off got pains in both hands today which not had before, chemo finished end Nov,  rads end Jan,  wish I was feeling better than I am , is anyone else going through the Same?, Sorry for the grumble but feeling fed up of being like this now,

Posts.Title: Aches n pains

Posts.Content: How long doe it take to recover from phlebitis of the arm, its painfull
Posts.Title: phlebitis

Posts.Content: hi i've gone throu chemo, mx with node clearance and start rads soon, couldnt have recon due to rads, but im not putting my body throu more surgery later on, im 46 too and going to use prosthesis when im all healed as no one can tell when dressed, but im comfortable with that , just do what makes you feel better about yourself.
Posts.Title: Implant removal

Posts.Content: Hi just in case it helps, I finished rads on 25 Jan,  I used diprobase cream given at rads appointment after 1 round of 15, used daily, I also had mastectomy so zapped at chest wall and neck, I found the following 2 weeks after rads the worst ,really red sore, skin peeling,  but quickly started to feel better, still red now after 3 week but not so bad, looking better, keep moisturising daily, r1 , r2 are lotions given for rads treatment but not many areas do as too expensive, e45 is good but ask at radiotherapy clinic for alternative if needed, I found them very helpful in checking the skin daily, hope this helps and good luck x

Posts.Content: Hi had a pic line fitted Thursday, is it common for the pics area to be sore for days after, if so how long till it settles down, thanks
